SpellDef.Description: This unit is boosted according to the various shards controlled.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Unit is +%d Dodge, +%d Defense, +%d Initiative, +%d Spell Mastery and +%d Spell Resistance. This spell is automatically cast on Amarian units at the start of battle.

SpellDef.Description: +1 Moves for controlling 3 Life shards.
Each time this unit is struck in melee combat, it gains +25% to all its physical defenses until it ends its next round. This bonus stacks.
TBD
This Frost Giant's initiative is locked to 16, and movement to 2. No spell, ability, effect, encumbrance or item may change this.
Caused by Golems with the Sever Soul trait. Increases mana cost of tactical spells until battle ends. Stacks.
Websling has a chance equal to ((Drota Troopcount+3 - Target Level) * 20) percent to make the target lose their next round unless they resist. Oversized targets are immmune to Websling.
The Death Legion is constantly changing from the corruption within.
At the start of combat, unit gains 25% damage resistance to either Blunt, Pierce or Cutting damage. This bonus is active but hidden.
At the start of combat, unit gains 66% damage resistance to either Fire, Cold, Lightning or Poison damage.
Some Undead troops have a chance to make enemies lose their next turn when outnumbered.
Unit has been given the Hexed trait!
Unit may not Regenerate any life for the rest of this combat. This does not affect other direct ways to improve health, such as Heal.
Unit has been given the Broken Shadow trait!
Take control of target city. Costs 200 Demon Souls.

This spell begins the process of turning the caster into an undead soldier by feeding dark magic into the Champion's soul.
Champion will from now on gain experience at half normal rate, and receives no benefit from any bonuses that increases experience gain. Champion suffers -5 Initiative and is capped at 3 Strategic Health regeneration.
All Injuries are removed. Champion cannot suffer any new Injuries.
Champion drains 1 Death Shard power. Champion counts as Immortal, Undead and as if it belonged to the Race: Undead. Champion also maintains its old Race.
Target city sacrifices half its citizens to produce 0.5 mana per sacrifice. City has its growth permanently reduced by 50%. Further blood sacrifices will not further reduce growth.
Take control of the targeted enemy with Race: Construct unless it resists.
Sovereign goes for a walk-about for 2 turns (during which you cannot move the sovereign). At the end a beast is summoned (level=caster level).
Transforms a shard in your empire into a Life shard.
+1 Moves for controlling 3 Air shards.

The caster gains a random new apprentice magic school (fire/water/earth/air). If the caster already has the randomly selected magic school, there is no effect. Can be repeated until the caster has all 4 schools.
Attack a unit from a distance with a single arrow from your bow.
Charge through enemies in a straight line, dealing damage equal to your attack to any in your way. Can be Dodged.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Charge through enemies in a straight line, dealing %d Attack to any in your way. Can be Dodged.

SpellDef.Description: Target suffers an Arcane attack equal to 2(+1 per level) multiplied by troopcount of Angel unit. Any unit that counts as Demon or Undead suffers double damage (triple damage if both are applicable). If resisted deals no damage.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target suffers an Arcane attack equal to %d. Any unit that counts as Demon or Undead suffers double damage (triple damage if both are applicable). If resisted deals no damage.

SpellDef.Description: Does a random effect to target unless target resists. While effect is in play, cannot use Changing Breath on same target again. Possible effects: Lose next turn. Poisoned for 2(+1 per level and +1 per Death Shard) Poison per turn. -10 Physical Attack resist. -33% of current Spell Resist. -2 Initiative. Effects last 5 actions.

Target unit suffers -1 Moves for 4 actions. In addition, target has a 100% chance to lose next turn if it has a Bow or Crossbow equipped. Ranged staffs and other ranged weaponry does not count. This ability can be resisted. Does not stack with itself.

Unit passes this turn. Unit gains +10 Accuracy and +10 Spell Mastery. In addition, all physical attacks will ignore 20% of target's Defense and the mana cost of any spell cast is reduced by 20%. These bonuses only applies to any action performed in the unit's next turn.
Perform a normal attack on target. Target's Dodge is set to 0 for 3 turns. Can be dodged.
Unit gains +50 Spell Resist until the end of its next turn.

Perform a normal attack on target. Target's Spell Resist and Fire/Cold/Poison/Lightning resist is reduced by 10% of their current value for 10 turns. Spells cast by target costs 10% more mana. This ability stacks with itself. Can be dodged.
Strike target with Race: Elemental for two normal attacks. Cannot be used against other targets. Can be dodged.
Perform a normal attack on target. If target is killed gain mana equal to target's level. Can be dodged.
Target has 50% (- 5% per own level + 5% per caster level) to lose its next turn. Range 3. Can be resisted.
Needles of fire shoot at an enemy for for 6 (+2 per level) fire damage. This damage is halved if the victim resists. Damage not multiplied by troopcount.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Needles of fire shoot at an enemy for for %d fire damage. This damage is halved if the victim resists.

SpellDef.Description: Shards of Ice shoot at an enemy for for 6 (+2 per level) cold damage. This damage is halved if the victim resists.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Shards of Ice shoot at an enemy for for %d cold damage. This damage is halved if the victim resists.
